title: 香港國際7人足球賽 訪港隊

replies.msg: CONFIRMED Defending champions Newcastle United, six-time champions Aston Villa FC, two-time winners Leicester City Football Club, last year’s runners-up, Rangers FC from Scotland as well as West Ham United and Brighton & Hove Albion FC will also lead the British challenge between May 17-19 for the 2019 HKFC Citi Soccer Sevens
CONFIRMED Wolverhampton Wanderers FC and Fulham FC Official will make their HKFC Citi Soccer Sevens debut in May.
